title.rendered: More Than $1 Million Raised for Medical Aid and Humanitarian Relief for Front Lines

content.rendered:
United Help Ukraine team wants to thank everyone who donated so far. We just crossed $1,000,000 mark!!!!! This is a lot but not enough. The situation is quickly developing, there is a great need for first aid medical supplies and humanitarian aid.

As the situation unfolds, we will begin providing humanitarian aid for refugees. Team UHU is working hard to locate, purchase, and deliver much-needed supplies as soon as possible, given the current situation in Ukraine.

Your support has been incredible and Ukrainian people know that you #StandWithUkraine!!! UHU team are all volunteers, and we operate at less than 1% administrative cost. Every $ will go to support the Ukrainian people and help them defend their country!

Glory to Ukraine! Glory to its heroes!

DONATE

  • Facebook: https://bit.ly/3tcwf2v
  • PayPal: https://bit.ly/3hh2OHi
